name: Blade Heroes - Dungeon Of Shadow Free
name_original: Blade Heroes - Dungeon Of Shadow Free
description:
Legends spoke of a blade forged by fire and ice that lies deep in the heart of the Dungeon of Shadow. Choose a hero to fight and select special skills and powers to do battle! Hack and slash your way to recover the sword!

* Choose your own hero!
* Dark and expansive dungeons!
* Treasure, experience, magic and more!
* Game Center Leaderboards

DOWNLOAD AND ADVENTURE TODAY!
